channel.title: Need case 192 help; Using items on other objects!
channel.description: Ok so case 192 is the using items on other objects case....My problem is that when i make custom global objects, such as an anvil in my case i can't use it for some reason, Like i use a bar on it and nothing happens but when i use a bar on any anvil the was already in the server source smithing works just fine........What's wrong what should I do add or edit????

item.title: Need case 192 help; Using items on other objects!
